page.shortlink: form layout image properties list properties
page.description: Settings for configuring an image in the FormView Layout. These properties for for an image that is not bound to a data source.

description.p: The *[ui:Dynamic image]* property is used to create one or more dynamic expressions to determine the image shown in the control. Multiple expressions can be defined in the *[ui:Dynamic Image Genie]*, which can be accessed by clicking the [...] smart field button for the Dynamic image property.
The ID for the image control.
If the image is statically defined, the image to display.
Specify if the image name should be specified now, or should be computed dynamically at run-time based on the result of a JavaScript expression.

item.name: Static
item.description: The image is defined at design time.

item.name: Dynamic
item.description: The image is dynamically defined at run-time.

description.p: An expression that defines whether or not the image is shown.
